channel.title: Mockito on Jeroen Mols
channel.description: Recent content in Mockito on Jeroen Mols

item.title: Using Mockito 2.x on Android
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: The Mockito team is on fire lately! Not only did they add support to mock final classes and methods, but now they allow running Mockito directly onto an actual Android device.

item.title: Extending Mockito
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Due to its clean simple api, Mockito has become world’s most popular Java mocking framework. After having covered all of its basics, it’s time to spice things up and start extending Mockito.

item.title: Testing made sweet with a Mockito
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: At Droidcon Berlin 2016 I had a great time talking about testing using the Mockito framework. While the talk wasn’t recorded unfortunately, the great folks at Voice Republic recorded an audio version which you can listen to as a podcast or together with the slides.
